name: Diggin' It
description:
Created in seven days for 7DRL, Diggin' It is a game about, you guessed it... digging!
Take control of Jacques Splintertooth as he searches an ever shifting underground cavern for a mysterious artifact known only as the Wisher's Fragment. Evade or battle a host of nasty cave dwelling beasties and use your experience points between floors to increase your stats or create useful items to aid you on your expedition!
Controls:
- Left click: Interact with inventory item, use shop interface, check further action history
- Right click: Drop inventory item
- arrow keys: move
- esc: Exit large screen menus, restart game on death
- enter: go through floor exits
- shift + arrow keys: hold to dig in any direction without moving
- g: grab item
- x: examine detailed item and enemy descriptions
- . or 5: wait- ?: show controls in game

As 7DRL judging is now finished, you can now play the updated version on the web!
